item.description: Hello- looking for individuals interested in meeting up this Sunday at Panera Bread in Watertown for a 6 or 8 mile run along the Charles. I run at a 9 1/2 minute per mile pace. You're welcome to run faster than that, but I won't be able to keep up with you, so bring a buddy. Meet out in front of Panera on Arsenal Street.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be out in front of Panera... wearing running clothes.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Sunday Morning Run Along the Charles
